Class netscape.application.HTMLParser 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.io.InputStream
           |
           +----java.io.FilterInputStream
                   |
                   +----netscape.application.HTMLParser
public class HTMLParser
extends FilterInputStream
A generic HTML parser. This class provides the HTML parsing functionality without defining how to store HTML. The user provides some information, telling the parser which class should be used for which marker. The parser creates instances of these classes.

HTMLParser(InputStream)
Constructor
HTMLParser(InputStream, HTMLParsingRules)

hashtableForAttributeString(String)
Utility to convert String containing attributes to Hashtable Keys will be converted to upper case.

Parse the next HTML component

Called on syntax error.
setClassForMarker(Class, String)
Convenience to avoid breaking constructor
setThrowsExceptionOnHTMLError(boolean)
Set whether the parser should raise when some bad HTML is parsed.
throwsExceptionOnHTMLError()
Return whether the parser throw an exception when some bad HTML is parsed

HTMLParser 
 public HTMLParser(InputStream in)
Constructor

HTMLParser 
 public HTMLParser(InputStream in,
                   HTMLParsingRules rules)

setThrowsExceptionOnHTMLError 
 public void setThrowsExceptionOnHTMLError(boolean flag)
Set whether the parser should raise when some bad HTML is parsed. if flag is false, bad statement will be just ignored The default is false.

throwsExceptionOnHTMLError 
 public boolean throwsExceptionOnHTMLError()
Return whether the parser throw an exception when some bad HTML is parsed

nextHTMLElement 
 public HTMLElement nextHTMLElement() throws IOException, HTMLParsingException, InstantiationException, IllegalAccessException
Parse the next HTML component

hashtableForAttributeString 
 public static Hashtable hashtableForAttributeString(String attributesString) throws HTMLParsingException
Utility to convert String containing attributes to Hashtable Keys will be converted to upper case.

reportSyntaxError 
 public void reportSyntaxError(String description) throws HTMLParsingException
Called on syntax error. Throw an exception if HTMLParsingException is enabled. Otherwise does nothing.

setClassForMarker

                               String aMarker)
Convenience to avoid breaking constructor
